pullrequest.title: Update the trigger_light plugin example to use ignition-transport

content.raw:
This may be a separate issue, but when I run the example with the gazebo 9.6.0 deb on my xenial machine, I see the console messages indicating that the lights turns on, then off, but I don't see the light actually turn on in gzclient.

@iche033 is it working on your machine?
content.html:
This may be a separate issue, but when I run the example with the gazebo 9.6.0 deb on my xenial machine, I see the console messages indicating that the lights turns on, then off, but I don't see the light actually turn on in gzclient.

@iche033 is it working on your machine?
